svg.text: copilot-dl-news ‚Äî 34 goals across 10 categories ‚Ä¢ Extracted from 100+ development sessions

g.text: ConfigurationService for CLI + runner config merging
Priority-based URL selection via decision trees
Control factories pattern, SSR check scripts
Visual codebase structure with byte-size scaling
Quick stats, recent activity, server health
Styled jsgui3 controls for tree display
Scanning progress bar with SVG indicator
Gap 2-4: Semantic queries, batch ops, plans ‚úì
Gap 5-6: Transitive deps, call graph analysis
UI Singularity, Dashboard Singularity, Research agents
Puppeteer tests for all Data Explorer routes
Graceful skip logic for missing fixtures
Fast validation without full test runner
Extract inline CSS/JS from server files
URL facts, document facts, schema facts
Decision trees operate on stored facts
Replace DOM polling with event-based waiting
Expose config drawer/timeline in Data Explorer
Build on Art Playground shared controls
Transitive dependencies and call graph analysis
Deterministic data that ships with repo

svg.text: Generated December 2, 2025 ‚Ä¢ github.com/metabench/copilot-dl-news ‚Ä¢ Industrial Luxury Obsidian Theme
